name: Infestation (1990)
description: Infestation is a first-person action-adventure computer game released in 1990. The game was published by Psygnosis, and released for the Amiga, Atari ST and IBM PC formats. Based on a science fiction scenario inspired in part by the films Alien and Aliens, the player is given the task of ridding a planetoid of insectoid alien life forms.
